## Pre-Merge Checklist
- [ ] Code builds successfully (`pnpm build`)
- [ ] Lint & tests pass (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings logged
- [ ] Changes follow existing naming conventions
- [ ] Documentation and comments are clear and meaningful
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data exposed (check `.env.example`, not `.env.local`)
- [ ] Branch is up to date with `main`
- [ ] Reviewed by at least one teammate
